EmailTemplate.name: SC-Email-4-EN.SC-Email-4-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy is More Than You Think
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
We have tailored our online business services and workplace products, catering especially to Service Canada. Our expanded offering will surprise you!
Change the way you shop: - Monitor your department spend & set budget limits - Browse curated lists from cleaning products to ergonomic furniture - Next-day delivery & live order tracking Check out our top products <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Workplace_Solutions_SC-EN.html?cmp=ABM-FedGov-SC&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Best, Olivier Dubeau Government Account Manager, Public Sector If you're having difficulty accessing the link in this email, please copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://go.grandandtoy.com/Workplace_Solutions_SC-EN.html 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z6 E-mail: OlivierDubeau@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:OlivierDubeau@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 613-355-1698 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
